mapper.update: update mf_gh set status = 1,ckuserid=#{ckuserid},cksj=now() where lsh = #{lsh} and status = 0
update mf_gh set status = 9 where lsh = #{lsh} and status = 0
update mf_gh set status = 10 where lsh = #{lsh} and status = 1

update mf_gh set hh=#{hh},sl=#{sl},lx=#{lx},province=#{province},city=#{city}, district=#{district},location=#{location},phone=#{phone},contact=#{contact},remark=#{remark}, qwsj=#{qwsj} where lsh = #{lsh} and status = 0
update mf_gh set status = '2', psdh = #{psdh}, driver_code = #{driver}, path_code = #{path} where lsh = #{lsh} and status = '1'
update mf_gh set status = '1', psdh = null, driver_code = null, path_code = null where psdh = #{lsh} and status = '2'
update mf_gh set status= '1',psdh = null, driver_code = null, path_code = null where lsh=#{lsh}
update mf_gh set status = '3',sdsj=now() where lsh=#{lsh} and status = '2'
mapper.select: select b.id, b.lsh , b.hh, b.sl, b.lx, b.province, b.city, b.district, concat(ifnull(b.province,''),' ',ifnull(b.city,''),' ',ifnull(b.district,''),' ',ifnull(b.location,'')) as location, b.phone, b.contact, b.qwsj, b.lrid, b.lrusername, b.truename, a.status, case b.lx when 0 then '正常' when 1 then '样机' when 2 then '赠品' when 3 then '残次' end as lxInfo, b.driver_code as driverCode, b.path_code as pathCode, b.store_code as storeCode,e.store_name as storeName, b.storage_code as storageCode,f.store_name as storageName, b.lrsj, b.cksj, b.zfsj, b.pcsj, b.fcsj, b.sdsj, c.pinm,c.xingh,c.tm,b.remark, case a.status when 0 then '配送中' when 1 then '已送达' when 2 then '未送达' end as statusInfo From mf_ghps_mx a left join mf_gh b on a.ddh = b.lsh left join mf_sp c on b.hh=c.hh left join mf_store e on b.store_code = e.store_code left join mf_store f on b.storage_code = f.store_code where a.lsh = #{lsh}

select b.id, b.lsh, b.hh, b.sl, b.lx, b.province, b.city, b.district, concat(ifnull(b.province,''),' ',ifnull(b.city,''),' ',ifnull(b.district,''),' ',ifnull(b.location,'')) as location, b.phone, b.contact, b.qwsj, b.lrid, b.lrusername, b.truename, a.status, case b.lx when 0 then '正常' when 1 then '样机' when 2 then '赠品' when 3 then '残次' end as lxInfo, b.driver_code as driverCode, b.path_code as pathCode, b.store_code as storeCode,e.store_name as storeName, b.storage_code as storageCode,f.store_name as storageName, b.lrsj, b.cksj, b.zfsj, b.pcsj, b.fcsj, b.sdsj, c.pinm,c.xingh,c.tm,b.remark, case a.status when 0 then '配送中' when 1 then '已送达' when 2 then '未送达' end as statusInfo From mf_ghpsrk_mx a left join mf_gh b on a.ddh = b.lsh left join mf_sp c on b.hh=c.hh left join mf_store e on b.store_code = e.store_code left join mf_store f on b.storage_code = f.store_code where a.lsh = #{lsh}

select lsh, lrid, truename, status, lrsj, hh, pinm, sl, lx,province,city,district, concat(ifnull(province,''),' ',ifnull(city,''),' ',ifnull(district,''),' ',ifnull(location,'')) as location, phone, contact, qwsj, sdsj,xingh,tm,remark, case status when 0 then '新增' when 1 then '已提交' when 2 then '已派车' when 3 then '已送达' when 9 then '已作废' when 10 then '已撤销' end as statusInfo, store_code as storeCode,store_name as storename,storage_code as storageCode,storage_name as storageName, dept_code as deptName,dept_name as deptName,driver_name as driverName,driver_phone as driverPhone from vw_xs where lsh = #{lsh}
